Posts.Content: jorbeck5 wrote: Hi, I have an u/s scheduled for 9/2 for a lump that I've felt since Feb (r/t breast). I had a radial scar biopsied in Dec (l/t breast), and was supposed to have a six month follow up visit. But I didn't get around to it until 8/29. The surgeon could feel the lump in question, and an additional lump (r/t breast). Last time, she sent me for a mammo and u/s; this time just an u/s. While I'm grateful I don't have to have my baps squoshed in that machine, I haven't been able to stop thinking that it is unusual for her to order just the u/s. I am just wondering if anyone else had a similar situation, and if this is a normal occurrence to skip the mammo, and go right to the u/s. Thanks, JJ. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Ultrasound only...?? jorbeck5 jorbeck5

Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2014 08:21PM jorbeck5 wrote: Thanks fizzdon52 for the reply. I will definitely talk to her about it. I'm due for my annual mammo anyway, so I will push for it. I just want to get it sorted, and get on with it. Thanks, again JJ.
